<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the marker algorithm from &quot;Simple and Efficient Construction of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Static Single Assignment Form&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The simple, non-marker algorithm places phi nodes at any join</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here, we place markers, and only place phi nodes if they end up necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// They are only necessary if they break a cycle (IE we recursively visit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ourselves again), or we discover, while getting the value of the operands,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that there are two or more definitions needing to be merged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This still will leave non-minimal form in the case of irreducible control</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flow, where phi nodes may be in cycles with themselves, but unnecessary.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NonOptPhis.count(Phi))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a379bee2dadbfd1d7a599f003c4275dd8">Phi</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect equal or self arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MemoryAccess &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a0e0d4848f799861d016ae63c8fdc41e3">Same</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/mirnamerpass-cpp/#a05e4be4ec3e2c3587dda0e376bb6822c">Operands</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the same or self, good so far</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == Phi || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a0e0d4848f799861d016ae63c8fdc41e3">Same</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not the same, return the phi since it&#39;s not eliminatable by us</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a0e0d4848f799861d016ae63c8fdc41e3">Same</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a379bee2dadbfd1d7a599f003c4275dd8">Phi</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#a9ab9d33dbeb44b5ba49ab27201e6bd76"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#a9ab9d33dbeb44b5ba49ab27201e6bd76">MemorySSAUpdater::insertUse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuse">MemoryUse</a> &#42;MU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RenameUses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuseordef/#a5c00de32cf1426ab78c346e7a251d608">setDefiningAccess</a>(getPreviousDef(MU));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In cases without unreachable blocks, because uses do not create new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may-defs, there are only two cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 There was a def already below us, and therefore, we should not have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// created a phi node because it was already needed for the def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 There is no def below us, and therefore, there is no extra renaming work</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In cases with unreachable blocks, where the unnecessary Phis were</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimized out, adding the Use may re-insert those Phis. Hence, when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting Uses outside of the MSSA creation process, and new Phis were</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = MP-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryphi/#aea0bb94cc4c6ee8016dc150efd4753c1">getBasicBlockIndex</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can&#39;t just compare i against getNumOperands since one is signed and the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BlockBB : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">llvm::drop&#95;begin</a>(MP-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryphi/#a49697edb86bb76a1234eaf11c2e95c18">blocks</a>(), i)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MP-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryphi/#a055daa2efd196d7b72c0f2d36019854e">setIncomingValue</a>(i, NewDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A brief description of the algorithm:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, we compute what should define the new def, using the SSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construction algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then, we update the defs below us (and any new phi nodes) in the graph to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point to the correct new defs, to ensure we only have one variable, and no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// disconnected stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#a21fc5eae685ef3e2dce4403a75d5ff2f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssaupdater/#a21fc5eae685ef3e2dce4403a75d5ff2f">MemorySSAUpdater::insertDef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorydef">MemoryDef</a> &#42;MD, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RenameUses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t bother updating dead code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MSSA-&gt;DT-&gt;isReachableFromEntry(MD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryaccess/#a9a9c59da949d32a269725b6e254d426f">getBlock</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuseordef/#a5c00de32cf1426ab78c346e7a251d608">setDefiningAccess</a>(MSSA-&gt;getLiveOnEntryDef());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  VisitedBlocks.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  InsertedPHIs.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if we had a local def, and if not, go hunting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryaccess">MemoryAccess</a> &#42;DefBefore = getPreviousDef(MD);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefBeforeSameBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryaccess/#a9a9c59da949d32a269725b6e254d426f">getBlock</a>() == MD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryaccess/#a9a9c59da949d32a269725b6e254d426f">getBlock</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;MemoryPhi&gt;</a>(DefBefore) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">llvm::is&#95;contained</a>(InsertedPHIs, DefBefore)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DefBeforeSameBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is a def before us, which means we can replace any store/phi uses</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Leave the MemoryUses alone.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// did. Because every may-def is the same, any phis/etc we would create, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would also have created.  If there was no local def before us, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performed a global update, and have to search all successors and make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sure we update the first def in each of them (following all paths until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we hit the first def along each path). This may also insert phi nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: There are other cases we can skip this work, such as when we have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single successor, and only used a straight line of single pred blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backwards to find the def.  To make that work, we&#39;d have to track whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getDefRecursive only ever used the single predecessor case.  These types</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of paths also only exist in between CFG simplifications.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If BB has multiple predecessors, get last definition from IDom.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Single predecessor, BB cannot be dead. GetLastDef of Pred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> == 1 &amp;&amp; Pred &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Single predecessor expected.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB can be unreachable though, return LoE if that is the case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(BB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MSSA-&gt;getLiveOnEntryDef();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BB = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unable to get last definition.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get nearest IDom given a set of blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: this can be optimized by starting the search at the node with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lowest level (highest in the tree).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FindNearestCommonDominator =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 2&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-structurizecfg-cpp-/#a68d8ef4336337d48e93d2695078eaa8a">BBSet</a>) -&gt; BasicBlock &#42; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrevIDom = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-structurizecfg-cpp-/#a68d8ef4336337d48e93d2695078eaa8a">BBSet</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#abf73a826b5d6f739eb4af48ddf14c5b4">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevIDom;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get all blocks that dominate PrevIDom, stop when reaching CurrIDom. Do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// include CurrIDom.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GetNoLongerDomBlocks =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrevIDom, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurrIDom,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SmallVectorImpl&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; &amp;BlocksPrevDom) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PrevIDom == CurrIDom)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BlocksPrevDom.push&#95;back(PrevIDom);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NextIDom = PrevIDom;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BasicBlock &#42;UpIDom =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Map a BB to its predecessors: added + previously existing. To get a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deterministic order, store predecessors as SetVectors. The order in each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be defined by the order in Updates (fixed) and the order given by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// children&lt;&gt; (also fixed). Since we further iterate over these ordered sets,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we lose the information of multiple edges possibly existing between two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks, so we&#39;ll keep and EdgeCount map for that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An alternate implementation could keep unordered set for the predecessors,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// traverse either Updates or children&lt;&gt; each time to get  the deterministic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order, and drop the usage of EdgeCount. This alternate approach would still</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require querying the maps for each predecessor, and children&lt;&gt; call has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// additional computation inside for creating the snapshot-graph predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As such, we favor using a little additional storage and less compute time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This decision can be revisited if we find the alternative more favorable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">PredInfo &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same argument.  If they do, by the definition of dominance frontiers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (which we used to place this phi), that argument must dominate this phi,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and thus, must dominate the phi&#39;s uses, and so we will not hit the assert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewDefTarget = <a href="#af38807ff8788bf371c9e216dd5ac6206">onlySingleValue</a>(MP);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;We can&#39;t delete this memory phi&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 This is a slightly modified version of RAUW to avoid walking the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 If we wanted to be complete, we would have to reset the optimized</span></CodeLine>
